data.event: In 1977 the village merged with Aye, Hargimon, Humain, Marche-en-Famenne, Marloie, On, Champlon and Roy to form the municipality of Marche-en-Famenne.

event.title: 1050 the present church of Saint Étienne was dedicated

data.event: In 1050 the present church of Saint Étienne was dedicated by the Liège bishop Theodwin (French: Théoduin).
